remarks: For two different vertices, a walk of length 2 between these vertices as ordered triple is a simple path of length 2 between these vertices as ordered triple in an undirected simple graph.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Mar-2018.)
statement: 2pthwlkonot $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ A =/= B ) -> ( A ( V 2SPathOnOt E ) B ) = ( A ( V 2WalksOnOt E ) B ) ) $.
